item.description:
The Wadsworth Atheneum's monthly event includes a double feature of Woody Allen movies this month.  From their website:  "It's ’80s Night! Break out your parachute pants, jelly shoes and anything neon and win a prize for the best eighties outfit! Enjoy music from the eighties performed by OPM and shred a shirt in our art activity. Free beer sampling from Olde Burnside while supplies last. Stay for the film, Midnight in Paris, which begins at 7:30pm."  This is followed by Annie Hall at 9:05pm.  The evening ends around 10:40pm, so be sure to buy some popcorn on the way into the cinema!

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1605783/

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0075686/

"Art After Hours" begins at 5:00pm.

$10 admission, free for members - movies are included in your entry fee.

 

(NOTE:  I have a red carpet movie premiere on Thursday so won't stay for the movies, but wanted people to  know about them.)
item.name: Double Feature at "Art After Hours" on Thursday
